pay.title: Pay for Nothing
pay.description: You are about to pay for absolutely nothing. No goods, no services, just pure void.

about.title: Nothing.
about.p1: Unlimited want. Finite resources. The basic economic problem.
about.p2: Now you have a solution. You can buy nothing.
about.p3: You buy nothing all the time â€” unused subscriptions, unclaimed insurance, a new boiler.
about.p4: Except now you finally know where that money goes. Nowhere.
about.tagline: You will own nothing. And it will be yours.
